docs.lead_paragraph: Researchers are programming robots to learn in humanlike ways and show humanlike traits. Could this be the beginning of robot consciousness — and of a better understanding of ourselves?

docs.lead_paragraph: LEGISLATORS in New Jersey and six other states, including New York and Connecticut, are weighing whether to give thousands of accurate birth certificates to their rightful owners, adult adoptees who now have access only to falsified certificates. Most of America's six million adoptees are members of what one calls ''a witness protection program we didn't ask to be in.'' When their adoptions were made final, the birth certificates bearing their names and those of their parents were sealed by the state, and they were issued ''amended'' certificates portraying their adoptive parents as having borne them. In some cases, adoptees' dates and places of birth were also falsified.
